name: Final Grades
description: Returns final grades for all users in course offerings. Required Permission Advanced Data Sets > Can Execute Final Grades (Organization level)

columns.name: User Id
columns.description: User's unique numeric D2L ID.

columns.name: Org Defined Id
columns.description: User's org defined ID.

columns.name: Username
columns.description: User's username.

columns.name: First Name
columns.description: User's first name.

columns.name: Last Name
columns.description: User's last name.

columns.name: Role Id
columns.description: D2L ID of the user's role in the specified org unit.

columns.name: Role Name
columns.description: Role name of the user in the specified org unit.

columns.name: Semester Id
columns.description: Unique semester numeric identifier in Brightspace. If a course is not associated with a semester, the value is NULL.

columns.name: Semester Name
columns.description: Semester name associated with the course offering.

columns.name: Semester Code
columns.description: Semester code associated with the course offering. The semester is the organization unit type as defined by the Standard Semester in Brightspace. If a semester is not associated as a direct parent of the course offering being exported, the value is NULL. If a course offering is associated with multiple semesters, these are exported as a pipe-delimited list of strings.

columns.name: Course Offering Id
columns.description: D2L's unique identifier for the course offering.

columns.name: Course Offering Code
columns.description: Often the course identifier from an SIS system.

columns.name: Course Offering Name
columns.description: Name of the course offering.

columns.name: Course Section Name
columns.description: Name of the course section.

columns.name: Final Calculated Grade (Percentage)
columns.description: Final calculated grade as a percentage.

columns.name: Final Calculated Grade Last Modified Date
columns.description: Last modified date for the final calculated grade.

columns.name: Final Adjusted Grade (Percentage)
columns.description: Final adjusted grade as a percentage.

columns.name: Final Adjusted Last Modified Date
columns.description: Last modified date for the final adjusted grade.

columns.name: Final Adjusted Comments
columns.description: Comments for the final adjusted grade.

columns.name: Final Adjusted Grade Is Released?
columns.description: Indicates if the final adjusted grade is released.

columns.name: Final Adjusted Last Modified By
columns.description: User that last modified the final adjusted grade.
